name: Ting Rai Bay Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Oh how we loved this place! We had two days here and worried we would be bored but we weren't ready to leave after our 48 hours. Yes, fairly basic - though reflected in the price and it was all clean and perfectly pleasant - but as long as you are happy to just sit on the beach and listen to the sea this place is great. Ting rai is on a smallish section of beach which keeps it quiet. The longer beach further south would be worth a visit I'm sure but we just relaxed locally. The food was lovely - best green curry of my trip. Very pleasant hosts.
reviews.title: Absolute island (basic) bliss

likes.disliked: — all good given we were only there two days

aka: Ting Rai Bay Hotel Koh Jum
description: Ting Rai offers a variety of Deluxe Bungalows which are spacious and comfortable enough for couples and families. The Upper Standard Bungalows are especially affordable for backpackers.All of our bungalows are furnished with big, comfortable beds. Each is equipped with private toilet and shower. All rooms have fans. The Beachfront Bungalow has optional air-conditioning. Each room has views of the ocean which you can enjoy from the comfort of your attached porch or verandah.Ting Rai Bay Resort has satellite internet service located in the restaurant for it's guests.
